verses.text: Thou shalt not \w raise|strong="H5375"\w* a \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w*: \w put|strong="H7896"\w* not thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* to be an \w unrighteous|strong="H2555"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*.\f + \fr 23.1 \ft raise: or, receive\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* a \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w* to \add do\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*; neither shalt thou \w speak|strong="H6030"\w* in a \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* to \w decline|strong="H5186"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* to \w wrest|strong="H5186"\w* \add judgment:\add*\f + \fr 23.2 \ft speak: Heb. answer\f*
¶ Neither shalt thou \w countenance|strong="H1921"\w* a \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* man in his \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

¶ If thou \w meet|strong="H6293"\w* thine \w enemy’s|strong="H0341"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* or his \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* going \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, thou shalt \w surely|strong="H7725"\w* bring it \w back|strong="H7725"\w* to him \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

If thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* of him that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* thee \w lying|strong="H7257"\w* under his \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, and wouldest \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w* to \w help|strong="H5800"\w* him, thou shalt \w surely|strong="H5800"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* with him.\f + \fr 23.5 \ft and…: or, wilt thou cease to help him? or, and wouldest cease to leave thy business for him: thou shalt surely leave it to join with him\f*
Thou shalt not \w wrest|strong="H5186"\w* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of thy \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* in his \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

Keep thee \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from a \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*; and the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* and \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* thou not: for I will not \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* no \w gift|strong="H7810"\w*: for the \w gift|strong="H7810"\w* \w blindeth|strong="H5786"\w* the \w wise|strong="H6493"\w*, and \w perverteth|strong="H5557"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.\f + \fr 23.8 \ft the wise: Heb. the seeing\f*

¶ Also thou shalt not \w oppress|strong="H3905"\w* a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*: for ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* of a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H3588"\w* ye were \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 23.9 \ft heart: Heb. soul\f*

And \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and shalt \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* in the \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* thereof:

But the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \add year\add* thou shalt let it \w rest|strong="H8058"\w* and \w lie|strong="H5203"\w* still; that the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: and what they \w leave|strong="H3499"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. In like manner thou shalt \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \add and\add* with thy \w oliveyard|strong="H2132"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft oliveyard: or, olive trees\f*

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*: that thine \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* and thine \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* may \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, and the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, may be \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w*.

And in all \add things\add* that I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you be \w circumspect|strong="H8104"\w*: and make no \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, neither let it be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
¶ \w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w* thou shalt keep a \w feast|strong="H2287"\w* unto me in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*: (thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, as I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, in the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w*; for in it thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and none shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*:)

And the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of thy \w labours|strong="H4639"\w*, which thou hast \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w ingathering|strong="H0614"\w*, \add which is\add* in the \w end|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, when thou hast \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* in thy \w labours|strong="H4639"\w* out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* all thy \w males|strong="H2138"\w* shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thou shalt not \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of my \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* with leavened \w bread|strong="H2557"\w*; neither shall the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of my \w sacrifice|strong="H2282"\w* \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 23.18 \ft sacrifice: or, feast\f*

The \w first|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt not \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w* in his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.

¶ Behold, I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* an \w Angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which I have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* him, and \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w provoke|strong="H4843"\w* him not; for he will not \w pardon|strong="H5375"\w* your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*: for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* in \w him|strong="H7130"\w*.

But if thou shalt \w indeed|strong="H8085"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all that I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; then I will be an \w enemy|strong="H0340"\w* unto thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and an \w adversary|strong="H6887"\w* unto thine \w adversaries|strong="H6696"\w*.\f + \fr 23.22 \ft an adversary…: or, I will afflict them that afflict thee\f*

For mine \w Angel|strong="H4397"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee in unto the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*: and I will cut them \w off|strong="H3582"\w*.

Thou shalt not bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* to their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, nor \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*: but thou shalt \w utterly|strong="H2040"\w* \w overthrow|strong="H2040"\w* them, and \w quite|strong="H7665"\w* break \w down|strong="H7665"\w* their \w images|strong="H4676"\w*.

And ye shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and he shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and thy \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and I will \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w sickness|strong="H4245"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee.

¶ There shall nothing cast their \w young|strong="H7921"\w*, nor be \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*, in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* I will \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w*.

I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* my \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and will \w destroy|strong="H2000"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to whom thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* turn their \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 23.27 \ft backs: Heb. neck\f*

And I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w hornets|strong="H6880"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, which shall drive \w out|strong="H1644"\w* the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

I will not drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; lest the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* become \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, and the \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7227"\w* against thee.

By \w little|strong="H4592"\w* and \w little|strong="H4592"\w* I will drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, until thou be \w increased|strong="H6509"\w*, and \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And I will \w set|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w bounds|strong="H1366"\w* from the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* even unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and from the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*: for I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and thou shalt drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.
Thou shalt \w make|strong="H3772"\w* no \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, nor with their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

They shall not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, lest they make thee \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against me: for if thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, it will surely be a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto thee.
